Symbol.Script_1D:
! ZONE CONTROLLER ! Iyur, ARCHIMATIKA, 2018 ! MVO Settings, used to control custom zone stamps and their behavior.
! APT DATA ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! This section is used to collect all zones assembling the single related appartment, parse it ! and put received data into zone stamps using MVO like a primary controller.
! SETTINGS
dim sStampList[5] sStampList[1] = "..." sStampList[2] = "Basic (Type Only)" sStampList[3] = "Advanced (Type & Gross Area)" sStampList[4] = "Complex (Type, Gross & Live Area)" sStampList[5] = "Special"
values{2} "iStampType" 1,sStampList[1], 2,sStampList[2], 3,sStampList[3], 4,sStampList[4], 5,sStampList[5]
dim sSignleStampList[3] sSignleStampList[1] = "..." sSignleStampList[2] = "Naming & Area" sSignleStampList[3] = "Number in Circle"
values{2} "iSingleStampType" 1,sSignleStampList[1], 2,sSignleStampList[2], 3,sSignleStampList[3]
! GLOBALS
! Columns in array
nTag = 1 nGross = 2 nLive = 3
! Refresh data sourceю
if bConnectionRefresh then
! Get current datetime, to use as a unique seed for connections
sTimeSeed = ""
cDateTime = OPEN ("DateTime", "", "%y.%m.%d %H:%M:%S") rGetTime = INPUT (cDateTime, "", "", sTimeSeed) close(cDateTime) parameters sConnectionSeed = sTimeSeed ! just for information
! Try to establish connection with a source file (this causes popupping browsing window)
cDataSource = open("text", sTimeSeed, "separator='\t', newline = crlf, mode=ro, dialog")
! Define whether connection was successful and all the data has been received
! Seems ok... if cDataSource > 0 then
! Run a cycle, while row returns some data
iRow = 1 ! index of room zones jRow = 1 ! index of appartment zones dim tZoneData[][] ! temporary array for rooms data dim tRoomData[][3] ! temporary array for appartments data
do rRowData = input(cDataSource, iRow, 1, sTag, iGross, iLive) if rRowData > 0 then
tZoneData[iRow][nTag] = sTag ! just to get row number
! Here we have to sort all existing zone tags and merge their areas. ! We're going to check previous entry and compare tags for each row in source file. ! Add them to previous zone (match case) or add to next one (mismatch).
if iRow > 1 then if sTag = tZoneData[iRow-1][nTag] then jRow = jRow else jRow = jRow + 1 endif else jRow = jRow endif
! Estimate gross & live are for each room tag
tRoomData[jRow][nTag] = sTag
rAreaGross = split(iGross, "%^n", rGross) if rAreaGross > 0 then tRoomData[jRow][nGross] = tRoomData[jRow][nGross] + rGross rAreaLive = split(iLive, "%^n", rLive) if rAreaGross > 0 then tRoomData[jRow][nLive] = tRoomData[jRow][nLive] + rLive
! We have to convert them back to strings, to transfer through parameter array
parameters aRoomData[jRow][nTag] = sTag parameters aRoomData[jRow][nGross] = str(tRoomData[jRow][nGross],4, 2) parameters aRoomData[jRow][nLive] = str(tRoomData[jRow][nLive], 4, 2)
iRow = iRow + 1
endif while rRowData > 0
! Check, how many rows in the source, if this returns null, it's weird, ! so connection status has to be negative for this input file.
parameters iZoneRows = vardim1(tZoneData) parameters iAppartments = jRow
if iAppartments <= 0 then parameters bConnection = 0 if iAppartments > 0 then parameters bConnection = 1
! Not connected... else parameters bConnection = 0 endif
parameters bConnectionRefresh = 0 ! reset button status
endif
Symbol.Script_UI:
! UI DEFINITIONS
sTitle = "ZONE OPTIONS (ARCHIMATIKA LIBRARY 2X)" xWidth = 600 xWidthHalf = 310 xOffset = 8 yHeight = 370 yOffset = 10 yRow = 20
! SCREEN
ui_dialog sTitle, xWidth, yHeight
! APARTMENTS ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield "APPARTMENTS", xOffset, yOffset ui_style 0, 0
! Data Source ui_outfield "Data Source:", xOffset, yRow * 2 ui_outfield "Select a special output file with all exported area values of required room spaces. All gross and live areas will be auto merged via IDs of related rooms and appartment spaces.", xOffset, yRow * 3, 275, 60, 4
ui_outfield "Last Update: " + sConnectionSeed + " (" + str(bConnection,1,0) + ")", xOffset, yRow * 8, 0, 0, 4 ui_outfield "Appartments / Room Entries: " + str(iAppartments,4,0) + " /" + str(iZoneRows,5,0), xOffset, yRow * 8.70, 0, 0, 4 ui_infield{3} bConnectionRefresh, xOffset, yRow * 6.5 - 1, 14, 16 ui_outfield "Select & refresh data source", xOffset + 20, yRow * 6.5, 150, 20
! Stamp Representation ui_outfield "Stamp Overrides:", xWidthHalf, yRow * 2 ui_outfield "Enabling this option allows to override all existent appartment stamps according to different purpose or stage. Those stamps have to be separated by special layer, settings or classification.", xWidthHalf, yRow * 3, 275, 60, 4
ui_infield{3} "iStampType", xWidthHalf, yRow * 6.5 -1, 275, 20, 8, "", 5, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, sStampList[1], 1, 2, sStampList[2], 2, 3, sStampList[3], 3, 4, sStampList[4], 4, 5, sStampList[5], 5
ui_separator xOffset, yRow * 10.5, xWidth, yRow * 10.5 !ui_infield{3} bTest, xOffset + 250, yRow * 11
! SINGLE ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield "SINGLE SPACES", xOffset, yRow * 11.5 ui_style 0, 0
! Explanations ui_outfield "Stamp Orientation:", xOffset, yRow * 13 ui_outfield "This option defines how zone stamp is reacting to custom view rotangle.", xOffset, yRow * 14, 275, 60, 4
ui_infield{3} bStampReadable, xOffset, yRow * 16.25, 14, 16 ui_outfield "Always Readable", xOffset + 20, yRow * 16.25, 150, 20
ui_outfield "This box will override zone stamps of all signle (non-gross) spaces according to selected option.", xWidthHalf, yRow * 14, 275, 60, 4
! Stamp Representation ui_outfield "Stamp Overrides:", xWidthHalf, yRow * 13
ui_infield{3} "iSingleStampType", xWidthHalf, yRow * 16.25, 275, 20, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, sSignleStampList[1], 1, 2, sSignleStampList[2], 2, 3, sSignleStampList[3], 3
ui_outfield iSingleStampType, 220, 170
